amendment.description: To limit the obligation and expenditure of funds for using procedures other than full and open competition for entering into certain contracts or other agreements for the benefit of Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1820 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1820 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S12354-12355; text: CR S12354) To limit the obligation and expenditure of funds for using procedures other than full and open competition for entering into certain contracts or other agreements for the benefit of Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1820 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1820 proposed by Senator Collins.
